## Notes

- a really neat, quick chart for visualising the relationship between two categorical variables in a dataset.
- works best with small numbers of variables, not too extreme differences
- [imported from mindseye TILs]


```{r}
library(mindseyedata)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Examples


```{r}
coroners |>
  ggplot(aes(x=verdict, y=gender)) +
  geom_count()
```


```{r}
cheshire_petitions |>
  ggplot(aes(x=topic, y=petition_type)) +
  geom_count()
```
